channel.title: +MT on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः
channel.description: Recent content in +MT on आगमे विश्वासटिप्पन्यः

item.title: Compatibility
item.description: Source: TW Arya tradition places importance on the right coupling of teacher and student – not every student is right for every teacher & vice versa. This is a custom-made pair. For exoteric matters, this might not matter that much – as long as there is sufficient compatibilty & competence on both sides, one can learn procedures from the teacher. However, behind the procedures is a “meaning” that might be termed “esoteric”.
